problem.markdown:
>>What is the aggregate arrival rate for the filling machine in bottles per sec? (round to 3 decimal places)<<
= 1.103 +-5%
>>What is the aggregate arrival rate for the capping machine in bottles per sec? (round to 3 decimal places)<<
= 1.149 +-5%
problem.label: What is the aggregate arrival rate for the filling machine in bottles per sec? (round to 3 decimal places)
What is the aggregate arrival rate for the capping machine in bottles per sec? (round to 3 decimal places)
